title: Changes minimum time for setting a special election to 50 days from the governor's proclamation and maximum time to 60 days
summary: Changes minimum time for setting a special election to 50 days from the governor's proclamation and maximum time to 60 days.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3619

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CLARK, COLTON, KAVANAGH -- Multi-Sponsored by --
         M. of A. GALEF, GOTTFRIED, PAULIN -- read once  and  referred  to  the
         Committee on Election Law

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the public officers law, in relation to the time for
         setting a special election

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Subdivision 3 of section 42 of the public officers law, as
    2  amended by chapter 105 of the laws  of  1943,  is  amended  to  read  as
    3  follows:
    4    3. Upon the failure to elect to any office, except that of governor or
    5  lieutenant-governor,  at  a  general  or special election, at which such
    6  office is authorized to be filled, or upon the death or disqualification
    7  of a person elected to office before the commencement  of  his  official
    8  term,  or  upon the occurrence of a vacancy in any elective office which
    9  cannot be filled by appointment for a period extending to or beyond  the
   10  next  general  election  at  which  a person may be elected thereto, the
   11  governor may in his discretion make proclamation of a  special  election
   12  to  fill  such  office,  specifying  the district or county in which the
   13  election is to be held, and the day thereof, which  shall  be  not  less
   14  than  [thirty]  FIFTY  nor more than [forty] SIXTY days from the date of
   15  the proclamation.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06542-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the time for setting a special election
